cause.description:
Niger people has a very big problem with the food supplies, it could become a severe starvation soon. According to the official statistics, there are more that 2988 village, occupied by more than three million inhabitants could face starvation.
1. Muslims should support each other and they are Muslims.
2. If we could not help at least we could let more people to know about it and we should ask Allah to help them as well.
cause.mission: Get more people to know about it, may be someone could help.
cause.name: Niger's Crises
